title: Hyundai advertising headline typeface?
content:
Trying to track down this typeface. I haven't had any luck using What the Font...

I'd be very appreciative of any help anyone can provide.

Erik

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055812im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hyundai_3686.jpg)

Font: 

 Modern H 

Solved By: 

 [Ryuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055812/http:/typophile.com/user/22675 "View user profile.")

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [hyundai.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055812/http:/typophile.com/files/hyundai.jpg) | 44.93 KB |
| [hyundai webpage.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055812/http:/typophile.com/files/hyundai%20webpage.jpg) | 561.36 KB |
author: esven

comments.content: If I'm not mistaking, this is Modern H(armony), Hyundai exclusive typeface and possibly designed by [YoonDesign](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317055812/http:/typophile.com/wiki/www.yoondesign.com) (at lest copyrighted).

I believe Modern H is correct. I just can't find it available anywhere. So your statement that it's "Hyundai Exclusive" is very true.

Thanks
